ygData.subject: Re: New Bard...
ygData.msgSnippet: i personally put all points to strength as our dex and charisma are pretty high base.  if you want to be in full platemail or melee well strength is important.
ygData.messageBody:
i personally put all points to strength as our dex and charisma are pretty
high base. if you want to be in full platemail or melee well strength is
important.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 12:16 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Well here are my thoughts...

Put 10 in Dex, 5 in Int, and the rest in Agi

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Fogle [mailto:steve.fogle@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:18 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>

Okay, I'm new to this list....

I want to start a new Bard. It looks like the Wood Elf is the best race for
a bard. My question is, how should I spend my 25pts?

Thanks for the info,

Steve
